author: Staff Reporter
text:
Customs officials at Chennai airport on Thursday arrested a 31-year-old man on charges of smuggling one kilogram of gold.

Sources said Customs staff checked the baggage of Rahman Muhammed, hailing from Hyderabad, who landed in Chennai from Dubai at 3 a.m. He had concealed the gold bars inside an emergency lamp.

They added it was worth nearly Rs. 30 lakh in the international market.
title: Arrested for smuggling gold
